TopicTitle: How to get kerbal into terrestrial buggy?

Articles.Content:
I can't figure out how to get a kerbal into the EAS-1 of the terrestrial buggy I made. I don't really want to have him inside a pod.

Edited January 30, 2015 by THX1138

When near the seat, right click it and there should be a button for "Board"

(You don't get the "Press [F] to board" prompt and it doesn't work - inconsistency in the game there.)

^^^

This. It works if you're "close enough"; the Kerbal doesn't actually have to be touching the seat before he can sit down.
The above works but also this is likely no longer going to be an issue in 1.0. Harvester made specific comments on adding edge grabbing abilities that I *think* will resolve it.
